title: Foundations of Deep Learning Applications for Tax Administration Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing understanding and applying deep learning technology to streamline tax administrative tasks for office/administrative professionals in corporate settings. Includes practice modules implemented in a mobile-centric format.

learning_goals: Differentiates and explains neural network and self-organizing map (SOM)-based solutions for tax administration data classification problems
Fundamental performance of deep learning models can be assessed using smartphone apps in limited technological environments
Proposes team-based prototypes for pattern analysis in unstructured tax-related data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
